Texts.Eng: A Bobot television? Perhaps it's from a line of children's furniture pieces...
Texts.Chs: 一台波波机器人电视？也许是从一系列儿童家具中。。。

Texts.Eng: A charming little television in the shape of a Bobot.
Texts.Chs: 一台波波机器人形状的迷人的小电视。

Texts.Eng: A television modeled after a Bobot. 99% guaranteed not to rear up and charge at you!
Texts.Chs: 模仿波波机器人的电视。99%保证不会向你冲锋！

Texts.Eng: As novel and cute as the idea behind this TV is, Bobots make me more than a little uncomfortable...
Texts.Chs: 尽管这台电视背后的想法既新奇又可爱，但波波机器人的造型让我有点不舒服。。。

Texts.Eng: Floran uses Bobot sshell when they don't have metal ready.
Texts.Chs: 叶族人在他们没有准备好金属的时候用波博特金属架。

Texts.Eng: I think the antenna are from actual Bobot...
Texts.Chs: 我认为天线是来自波波机器人的身体的。。。

Texts.Eng: It's a little small, isn't it? I'd have preferred a flat screen.
Texts.Chs: 有点小，不是吗？我更喜欢平面屏幕。

Texts.Eng: It's too small to have been an actual Bobot... Perhaps this is just a model?
Texts.Chs: 它太小了，不可能是真正的波波机器人。。。也许这只是一个模型？
